description: Apply a non-linear filter onto a PNM image. More information: https://netpbm.sourceforge.net/doc/pnmnlfilt.html.

useCases.description: Apply the "alpha trimmed mean" filter with the specified alpha and radius values onto the PNM image:
Apply the "optimal estimation smoothing" filter with the specified noise threshold and radius onto the PNM image:
